column6: "KITCHEN IRISH" PART 4 (OF 6) The onslaught continues!  You demand the most mind-blowing entertainment, and that's not ALL that's being blown away, as Frank Castle continues his siege on rival gangs warring in Hell's Kitchen.
column8: | penciller (cover):Tim Bradstreet | writer:Garth Ennis | penciller:Leandro Fernandez | colorist:Dean White
